snippet: About 10 foreigners were missing after an attack on a Libyan oil field, and it is possible they had been taken hostage, the Czech Republic’s foreign minister said Saturday.
abstract: Authorities in Czech Republic report that 10 foreigner workers are missing from oil field in Ghani, Libya, including one Czech citizen; security forces have retaken control of oil field but missing foreigners are feared kidnapped; no group has claimed responsibility.
lead_paragraph: About 10 foreigners were missing after an attack on a Libyan oil field, and it is possible they had been taken hostage, the Czech Republic’s foreign minister said Saturday.

headline.main: Foreign Workers Missing After Militants Attack Libyan Oil Field
headline.print_headline: Foreign Workers Missing After Militants Attack Libyan Oil Field
